title: Kompas Antivirus 3.0.1
description:
Kompas Antivirus 3.0.1
 
 <a href="
http://anti.malware.web.id" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://anti.malware.web.id</a>
------------------

Kompas Antivirus designed to fight off all malware types especially to detect
RATs, keyloggers, stealers, crypters, binders, spywares, worms and more. 

Just relying on a single vendor is not sufficient to completely protect you. You do need a second layer 
to make sure you are secure. Kompas Antivirus features simple interface to make it simple and easy to use.

    - Fast and Light Scan Engine

    - Automatic Priority Updates and Scheduled Scanning

    - Real-Time File System Protection Blocks Known Threats

    - Advanced Heuristic Protection Prevents New Zero Day Malware Infection

    - Best USB Antivirus Detects All Kinds of Threat in Removable Media

    - Additional Tools Unhides Files/Folders, Restores Hijacked Browser and many more.
